Articles.Content: Hello everyone, welcome to the weekly post of "IRD". This week's challenge is, drumroll please,  a space station in low kerbin orbit, required to have at least two crew pods. Anything else you want to add you can! Enjoy the challenge. Final date for submissions is sunday october 25th. Next week, the challenge starts on monday so don't delay!

Howdy and welcome to the forum.

Your challenge has been moved to the Challenges subforum. May it thrive there.
Thank you Captain, I appreciate the movement and assistance.
